subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Backstrom had a goal and an assist, and Eric Fehr scored the tiebreaking goal past the Rangers’ Cam Talbot with 5 minutes 9 seconds left to lift the Capitals over the Rangers.
snippet: Nicklas Backstrom had a goal and an assist, and Eric Fehr scored the tiebreaking goal past the Rangers’ Cam Talbot with 5 minutes 9 seconds left to lift the Capitals over the Rangers.
